name: odin-claude-plugin
description: ODIN (Outline Driven INtelligence) - Advanced code agent with 57 specialized agents, 127 commands, diagram-first engineering, and atomic commit workflows for surgical precision in software development
features: 127 organized commands for comprehensive workflow support
Diagram-first engineering with 5 required diagrams (Architecture, Data Flow, Concurrency, Memory, Optimization)
Atomic commit protocol following Conventional Commits v1.0.0
Surgical editing workflow using ast-grep, ripgrep, fd, and lsd
Confidence-driven execution with adaptive behavior patterns
Sequential thinking tools for complex problem decomposition
Pre-configured permissions for safe tool usage
Comprehensive language-specific guidelines (Rust 2024, TypeScript, Python, Go, Java, Kotlin, C++)
Context loading for major frameworks and platforms
